mapper.select: select SID, DESCR, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TRANSLATEGROUP, PRICEGROUP, CONTENTGROUP, PICGROUP, DESIGNGROUP, CHECKGROUP, PUBLICGROUP, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, NAME, SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE, PRODUCTID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, PRODUCTSKU from db_project where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, DESCR, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TRANSLATEGROUP, PRICEGROUP, CONTENTGROUP, PICGROUP, DESIGNGROUP, CHECKGROUP, PUBLICGROUP, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, NAME, SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE, PRODUCTID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, PRODUCTSKU from db_project
